name: On people with a high IQ
author: Michel Moreau
post:
They have capacity for intelligence that potentially never translates to intelligence itself.

Bill Gates, Larry Page, Einstein, Newton, Elon Musk, Nikola Tesla, and many other high IQs applied their capacity for intelligence and made something impactful out of it.

A 180-IQ guy whose only hobby is to get better at IQ testing potentially has capacity for intelligence but is not intelligent until he applies this capacity to something meaningful/impactful.
